The Sound of Revenge is the debut solo album from American rapper Chamillionaire, although it is not
Chamillionaire&#039;s debut album as he had released several albums and many mixtapes previously. It was 
produced by Scott Storch, Mannie Fresh, Play-N-Skillz, Cool and Dre and other producers. It was 
released in 2005 and includes contributions from Lil&#039; Flip, Lil Wayne, younger brother Rasaq, 
Natalie Alvarado, Krayzie Bone, Bun B, Scarface and Pastor Troy.
